amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 116-42 to add a finding noting that the Paris Agreement is an example of multilateral, international cooperation needed to overcome challenges facing the international community.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pallone amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Pallone.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pallone amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
